welcome_message_body: Welcome to Metairie, where southern charm meets modern convenience. Known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and welcoming locals, we invite you to explore all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay.

restaurants.name: Haydel's Bakery
restaurants.description: Haydel's Bakery is a bakery located in New Orleans.

restaurants.name: Sake Cafe of Elmwood
restaurants.description: Sake Cafe of Elmwood is a sushi restaurant located in Elmwood.

restaurants.name: District Donuts Sliders Brew
restaurants.description: District Donuts Sliders Brew is a donut shop located in Elmwood.

restaurants.description: Chick-fil-A is a fast food restaurant located in New Orleans.

airports.airport_name: Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport serves domestic flights for American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport serves domestic flights for United Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport serves international flights for Air Canada, Alaska Airlines, and Frontier Airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lakefront Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lakefront Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
